Changelog
=========

0.2 (2010-10-31)
----------------

  * Support for Plone 4.
    [simahawk, zupo]
  * Reviewed the i18n supports for generate new msgid
    [macagua]
  * Validated the templates source code using the updated script rebuild_i18n.sh
    [macagua]
  * Added documentation/information files on directory called "doc"
    [macagua]


0.1 - 05.10.2009
----------------

  * Initial release
    [iElectric]
